meta.title: Foudroyer x Search GPT, index and track your position.
meta.description: SEO is evolving, and today the needs are towards Search GPT. Index and track your position with this new search engine.

title.value: Index your pages and _**track keywords in Search GPT.**_

content.description: We might be in a new phase of SEO. Search GPT has launched, and there might be a great opportunity to position your website for specific queries. Stay ahead of your competitors by positioning yourself in Search GPT.

title.value: Indexing in Search GPT and Bing.

content.description: To appear in Search GPT, you first need to ensure your pages are properly indexed in Bing. This is mandatory because Search GPT relies on Bing's index.

features.name: Analysis of page indexing status in Bing.
features.description: Our platform checks if your pages are properly indexed in Bing and provides reports on indexing status.

features.name: Manual or automatic submission of non-indexed pages.
features.description: Bing is quite lazy and won't index your website much without using their API. They've developed an API to easily push pages.

features.name: Track indexing status over time.
features.description: Among the pages you choose, we regularly check the indexing status to ensure pages remain indexed. If they disappear, we automatically start the indexing process.

title.value: Track keywords in Search GPT and Bing.

content.description: To appear in Search GPT, your pages need to rank high in Bing. According to our tests, you need to be on the first page for short keywords and up to the second page for long keywords.

features.name: Add keywords you want to position for in Search GPT and Bing.
features.description: To appear in Search GPT, you need to focus on specific keywords. This allows you to track your position in detail in both Bing and Search GPT.

features.name: Check if your pages appear in Search GPT.
features.description: If you know your site's position and requests, you can know whether it appears in the text or source.

features.name: Get alerts when there's movement in Search GPT.
features.description: If your keywords appear or disappear in Search GPT, you'll receive notifications and can understand why the content disappeared.

label.value: 3. Finally, we optimize your content to appear in Search GPT.

title.value: Search GPT content advice and optimization.

content.description: Being indexed in Bing and having good rankings is not enough to appear in Search GPT. Search GPT searches and finds information based on specific criteria. We're here to guide you.

features.name: Advanced query analysis.
features.description: We analyze how Search GPT searches for information about target keywords.

features.name: Page and content analysis.
features.description: We compare search data with your page content to verify if the content matches search intent.

features.name: Content optimization tips based on Search GPT data.
features.description: Based on collected data, we provide advice to optimize your page content, including text removal and additions.

content.value:
Hello! I'm Kevin Marques, 31 years old, and I'm very happy that you're reading these lines.

I created Foudroyer in 2021. Even at that time, indexing was one of the main concerns for website publishers.

3 years later, with millions of pages indexed in Google, Bing, and Yandex, I believe I'm in a very good position to focus on Search GPT.

I discovered that Search GPT has just launched and is based on Bing's search engine. I've been advocating for indexing and positioning in Bing for years, and I think in 2024, the potential of this search engine is clearly visible.

If you don't want to miss this new opportunity and want to stay ahead of your competitors, I recommend using Foudroyer to position yourself today for what might be the future of SEO.

items.question: What do I get when I purchase a pre-order?
items.answer:
Once payment is complete, you'll receive a **one-time use link** to access a private Discord.

In this Discord server, we can discuss features, progress, and build this new product together. **There are roadmaps, to-do lists, and discussions about SearchGPT.**

We share techniques and useful information about indexing and positioning in SearchGPT and Bing.

items.question: How soon can I test the product?
items.answer:
Pre-ordering has **three benefits**.

1. First, it's at a much lower price than when the product launches.
2. Second, you get the opportunity to access the beta version of the product.
3. And finally, **when v1 is complete**, you'll get access to the final platform one month before others, giving you a significant competitive advantage.

items.question: What does it mean to have access to the service for 1 year?
items.answer:
Once the project is officially deployed and publicly accessible, you'll be able to use the product for free with the higher subscription plan.

I'll make sure you're at an advantage and benefit from the best plan.

For example, if there are two plans, one at $29 and another at $49, **you'll automatically be on the $49 plan.**

items.question: What are the refund conditions?
items.answer:
Technical issues might occur, and the project might not be released in the end.

In such unexpected cases, **I'll make sure to initiate refunds for everyone.**

After the project is officially deployed, if the service provided is not of excellent quality, **we can discuss and proceed with a refund.**
